source_caption_data.pre_caption: This dramatic scenery shot captures a massive thunderstorm at night over a flat, dark landscape. Flashes of lightning illuminate the turbulent, dark clouds from within, contrasting with the deep blue and purple hues of the sky where stars are visible. The video is a time-lapse, showing the evolution of the storm system.
